sen.j: 狂言口開けで、アイがここは雲居寺境内、今日は自然居士（半俗の少年僧）の七日説法の結願（最終日）であると説明する。
sen.e: At Kyogen (farce played during a No play cycle) kuchiake (strat), ai (the role of a kyogen actor in Noh) explains that here is precincts of Ungo-ji Temple and today is Kechigan (expiration of term of a vow/the last day) of Nanuka seppou (seven days of sermons) by Jinen Koji (a boy monk of hanzoku (monk living as ordinary people)).

In the opening Kyogen (farce played during a Noh play cycle), the ai (role of a kyogen actor in Noh) explains that we are at Ungo-ji Temple and today is Kechigan (the last day) of Nanoka seppou (seven days of sermons) by Jinen Koji (a boy monk of hanzoku [monk living as ordinary people]).
sen.cmt: Nohの綴りを修正しました。スペースを削除しました。冠詞を修正しました。狂言口開けの訳を変えました。七日の綴りを修正しました。結願の解説を変えました。括弧の使用を修正しました。
sen.e: In the opening Kyogen (farce played during a Noh play cycle), the ai (role of a kyogen actor in Noh) explains that we are at Ungo-ji Temple and today is Kechigan (the last day) of Nanoka seppou (seven days of sermons) by Jinen Koji (a boy monk of hanzoku [monk living as ordinary people]).

sen.j: アイの言葉を受け、シテの自然居士が現れる。
sen.e: Receiving words from ai, Jinen Koji, the shite, appears on stage.
Receiving words from the ai, Jinen Koji, the shite, appears on stage.
Receiving words from the ai, Jinen Koji, the shite, appears on stage.

sen.j: そこに貧しい幼い者が現れ、衣を差し出し両親の供養を願う。
sen.e: A poor child appears and asks for a memorial service for his/her parents, offering a garment.
A poor child appears and asks for a memorial service for his/her parents, offering a garment.

sen.j: 自然居士も見物人も幼い者の心がけに涙するのであった。
sen.e: Jinen Koji and viewers shed tears for the attitude of the child.
Jinen Koji and viewers shed tears for the attitude of the child.
Jinen Koji and viewers shed tears for the attitude of the child.

sen.j: この間にワキの人買いが一の松まで現れ、買い上げた幼い者を連れ去ろうと説教の場に乱入する。
sen.e: During the scene, a human trafficker, a waki, appears to ichi no matsu (first pine) and forces his way into a sermon to abduct the child, who he has bought.
During the scene, the waki, a human trafficker, appears at ichi no matsu (first pine on the Noh stage) and forces his way into the sermon to abduct the child, whom he has bought.
sen.cmt: 一の松の解説を変えました。ワキと人買いの順序を変えました。冠詞を修正しました。Whoをwhomにしました。
sen.e: During the scene, the waki, a human trafficker, appears at ichi no matsu (first pine on the Noh stage) and forces his way into the sermon to abduct the child, whom he has bought.

sen.j: 自然居士はかの衣は幼い者が人買いに自らを売って得たものと見抜く。
sen.e: Jinen Koji sees that child got the garment by selling himself to the human trafficker.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Jinen Koji perceives that the child had gotten the garment by selling himself to the human trafficker.
sen.cmt: Seesをperceivesにしました。時制を修正しました。
sen.e: Jinen Koji perceives that the child had gotten the garment by selling himself to the human trafficker.

sen.j: そしてこれまでの六日間が無駄になるのを承知で、善悪を弁えることが更に重要であると説教をやめる。
sen.e: Jinen Koji takes greater importance in knowing right and wrong and stops preaching, knowing past 6 days will be wasted.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Jinen Koji stops preaching, knowing the past 6 days will be wasted but placing greater importance in distinguishing right and wrong.
Jinen Koji stops preaching, knowing the past 6 days will be wasted but placing greater importance in distinguishing right and wrong.

sen.j: 幼い者に縄をかけ舟に乗って去って行く人買いを追い諭そうとする。
sen.e: He chases after the human trafficker, who binds the child with rope and leaves on a boat, and tries to admonish.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: He chases after the human trafficker, who binds the child with rope and leaves on a boat, and tries to admonish him.
sen.cmt: Admonishに目的語を追加しました。
sen.e: He chases after the human trafficker, who binds the child with rope and leaves on a boat, and tries to admonish him.

sen.j: 琵琶湖畔は大津で人買いに追い付いた自然居士は衣を叩き付けるが、人買いにも一旦買った者は返さないという掟があると譲らない。
sen.e: Jinen Koji catches up with the human trafficker at the shore of Lake Biwa in Otsu and throws the garment at him but the human trafficker does not budge as there is a rule that he will not return once purchased.

Jinen Koji catches up with the human trafficker at the shore of Lake Biwa in Otsu and throws the garment at him but the human trafficker does not budge as there is a rule that he will not return anything that has been purchased.
sen.cmt: Onceをanything that has beenに変えました。
sen.e: Jinen Koji catches up with the human trafficker at the shore of Lake Biwa in Otsu and throws the garment at him but the human trafficker does not budge as there is a rule that he will not return anything that has been purchased.

sen.j: 自然居士もまた人助けに失敗したら二度と庵室に戻らないという掟があると言いはる。
sen.e: Jinen Koji also insists, there is a rule that he will never return hermitage once he fail to save a person.
Jinen Koji also insists that there is a rule that cannot return to his hermitage if he fails to save a person.
sen.cmt: 自然な表現に直しました。
sen.e: Jinen Koji also insists that there is a rule that cannot return to his hermitage if he fails to save a person.

sen.j: 人買いは「言う事をきかないと痛い目に合うぞ」と脅すが「それも捨身の行」と譲らない。
sen.e: The human trafficker threatens saying 'you will get hurt if you do not listen' but Jinen Koji does not budge saying 'that is also the ascetic practice of sacrifice'.
The human trafficker threatens Jinen Koji, saying 'you will get hurt if you do not listen,' but Jinen Koji does not budge saying 'that is also the ascetic practice of sacrifice'.
sen.cmt: Threatenに目的語を追加しました。
sen.e: The human trafficker threatens Jinen Koji, saying 'you will get hurt if you do not listen,' but Jinen Koji does not budge saying 'that is also the ascetic practice of sacrifice'.

sen.j: 「殺すぞ」と脅しても「殺されても舟から下りない」としぶとい。
sen.e: Jinen Koji is determined, replying 'I will not get off even killed' when he was threatened and said 'I will kill you'.
Even when threatened with death Jinen Koji does not give, saying 'I will not get off the boat even if it means I am killed.'
sen.cmt: 自然な表現にするため意訳しました。
sen.e: Even when threatened with death Jinen Koji does not give, saying 'I will not get off the boat even if it means I am killed.'

sen.j: 人買いも困り果て、自然居士に舞を舞わせ、それで幼い者を返してやることにする。
sen.e: The human trafficker is unnerved and decided to make Jinen Koji to dance, in return he gives back the child.
Confounded, the human trafficker decides to have Jinen Koji perform a dance in return for the child.
sen.cmt: 自然な表現に直しました。
sen.e: Confounded, the human trafficker decides to have Jinen Koji perform a dance in return for the child.

sen.j: 自然居士は舟を題材にした中ノ舞、羯鼓の舞を見せ、めでたく幼い者を京都に連れ帰ることに成功した。
sen.e: Jinen Koji performs dances on the theme of a boat, Naka no mai (dance) and Kakko no mai (dance with a small drum used in the Court music of Japan and hit with sticks at each end), and he happily succeeded in taking the child back to Kyoto.
Jinen Koji performs a Naka no mai (dance) and Kakko no mai (dance with a small drum), both about boats, and happily succeeds in taking the child back to Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 自然な表現に直しました。
sen.e: Jinen Koji performs a Naka no mai (dance) and Kakko no mai (dance with a small drum), both about boats, and happily succeeds in taking the child back to Kyoto.
